LOGIN.TITLE: Sign In
LOGIN.DESCRIPTION: Your AI personal assistant for youtube studio.
LOGIN.CONTINUE: By clicking continue, you agree to our
LOGIN.CAUTION: Open Studio's use and transfer of information received from Google APIs to any other app will adhere to
LOGIN.GOOGLE_TERMS: Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.

LOGIN_FORM.BY_CONTINUING: By continuing you agree to allow Open Studio sends your comments to OpenAI for processing. OpenAI does not use the submitted data to train or improve their AI models.

EARLY_ACCESS_MODAL.TITLE: Early Access
EARLY_ACCESS_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Open Studio is in early access, awaiting full approval from Google to use Youtube Data API. Till then you will see a warning sign when signing in. To get past this warning, click 'Advanced' and then 'Go to Open Studio'.
EARLY_ACCESS_MODAL.UNDERSTAND: I understand I will see a warning message when signing in

COMMENTS_CATEGORY.TITLE: Types Of Comment You're Receiving
COMMENTS_CATEGORY.DESCRIPTION: Use AI to categorize your comments

SUBSCRIBER.TITLE: Subscribers Gained Vs Subscribers Lost
SUBSCRIBER.DESCRIPTION: Showing total count for the selected date range

THEME.TITLE: Theme
THEME.DESCRIPTION: Select how you would like your interface to look. Select theme from dark, light or system.
